channel.title: Hardest code to do ~ need big help
channel.description: [size=5]hi , again its neewbie me i am wandering in sum 1 could give me a command and tell me where to put it the command i need is : a command for players to choose alliance / horde (like WOW) or nueteral if the player clicks alliance they get melee and a message says welcome to the alliance melee player in a box that pops up and all the rules for alliance and if horde is clicked they get mage armour and they get mage team if nueteral is clicked they get range/ or dont want a side to go on also for extra information when i get a client i want player names to go blue for alliance and red for horde or green for nuetral i want players able to choose a side once and once only [/size]

item.title: Hardest code to do ~ need big help
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

[size=5]hi , again its neewbie me i am wandering in sum 1 could give me a command and tell me where to put it the command i need is :
a command for players to choose alliance / horde (like WOW) or nueteral if the player clicks alliance they get melee and a message says welcome to the alliance melee player in a box that pops up and all the rules for alliance and if horde is clicked they get mage armour and they get mage team
if nueteral is clicked they get range/ or dont want a side to go on
also for extra information when i get a client i want player names to go blue for alliance and red for horde or green for nuetral
i want players able to choose a side once and once only [/size]
